label: Consumer Goods
description: Products and services that are purchased by individuals for personal use.
intents: Find the best products for my needs
Learn about the latest products and trends

subcategories.label: Watches
subcategories.description: Timepieces worn on the wrist or carried in a pocket.

subcategories.label: Luggage
subcategories.description: Bags and containers used for transporting personal belongings.

subcategories.label: Cannabis
subcategories.description: Products derived from the cannabis plant, including marijuana and CBD oil.

subcategories.label: Apprenticeships
subcategories.description: Training programs that combine on-the-job learning with classroom instruction.

subcategories.label: Animal Testing
subcategories.description: The use of animals in scientific experiments and product testing.

subcategories.label: Crowdfunding
subcategories.description: The practice of funding a project or venture by raising small amounts of money from a large number of people.
